welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kumatori, a charming city known for its delicious local food and beautiful nature. We invite you to explore and experience the unique culture and hospitality of our city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal mainly used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free Wi-Fi for up to 3 hours per day.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kobe Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Kobe Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Itami Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Itami Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the ITM_Free_WiFi network.
